tns:patch.author: Octavian Ciubotaru
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_component_second_responsible_organization_name; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_component_second_responsible_organization_name AS SELECT aac.amp_activity_id, org.name AS org_name, f.component_second_rep_org_id AS org_id, aac.amp_component_id, c.type AS component_type_id, f.rep_organization_id AS component_rep_org_id FROM amp_activity_components aac JOIN amp_components c ON c.amp_component_id = aac.amp_component_id JOIN amp_component_funding f ON f.amp_component_id = aac.amp_component_id JOIN amp_organisation org ON org.amp_org_id = f.component_second_rep_org_id;
